attributes.action: make it a criminal act by the Media, specifically the Press, to use the title 'Witch' as a form of abuse, as in, for example,'evil witch' or 'poisonous witch'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wicca is a pacifist Earth based belief system and we find this usage both outdated and offensive, not only to Witches but to Pagans overall.
